title: Drawing, "Drawing. Botanical sketches.  Jamaica, West Indies.", May–August 1865
markings: Verso:  Stamped in ink, at lower right: Lugt 457d
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite with figures at various locations at lower left, and again at bottom left:  2 yellow 3 green  /  Older & Larger branches yellow / younger green
description: Horizontal view of a long stem of bamboo drawn obliquely from top right to bottome left, with two small stems at top left.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Drawing. Botanical sketches.  Jamaica, West Indies.", May–August 1865.
May–August 1865. Graphite on greenish paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-955-b.
